pkgmetadata.longdescription: # MapelThis package's purpose is to install jointly the following (so far all) parts ofthe mapel ecosystem: 1. mapel-core1. mapel-elections1. mapel-roommates1. mapel-marriagesSee the documentation of the above for further information.# AcknowledgmentsThis project is part of the [PRAGMA project](https://home.agh.edu.pl/~pragma/)which has received funding from the [European Research Council(ERC)](https://home.agh.edu.pl/~pragma/) under the European Unionâ€™s Horizon 2020research and innovation programme ([grant agreement No101002854](https://erc.easme-web.eu/?p=101002854)).
